alert.note: Alert for Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Kleberg Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 3:33PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Nueces and northeastern Kleberg Counties through 400 PM CST... At 332 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Malaquite Beach, or 18 miles south of Corpus Christi, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Malaquite Beach and Chapman Ranch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Kleberg Islands
